instruction: Present a new idea for a research paper on AI.
output: Exploring the use of AI-driven personal assistants to improve the halthcare industry. This paper will discuss the potential benefits of using AI-driven assistants in the healthcare industry, as well as the challenges and best practices needed to ensure success. It will explore the potential ethical and legal considerations surrounding the use of AI. Finally, the paper will consider the potential consequences of AI's increased presence in healthcare.
